input.job_description:
AFNAN FAIZ 
  
  
  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
A goal -directed, skilled communicator , team -spirited, persuasive, 
adaptable, self -motivated , and career -oriented individual seeking to 
utilize analytical skills and experience to contribute to your 
organization's growth and objectives.  
  
  
  
WORK HISTORY  
 
Business Development Executive (March 202 2– July 2022 )   
TechNerds Inc. - Lahore, Punjab   
   
· Upwork bids management.  
· LinkedIn with Sales Navigator to target prospects.   
· Projects analysis and Proposals development.    
· Monthly and weekly development team success reporting.   
· Email marketing.  
 
 
Senior Business Development Officer (Oct  2021 – Feb 2022  ) 
Cybexo Inc.  - Lahore, Punjab  
 
· Upwork bids management.  
· LinkedIn with Sales Navigator to target prospects.  
· Website Development  and Application Development client handling.   
· Projects development management and client meetings 
management.  
· Projects analysis and Proposals development.  
· Monthly and weekly development team success reporting.  
· Collaborate with the development team and provide them with all 
the information for the project’s development . 
· Email Marketing Via Sendy.  
 
 
Business Development Officer ( Oct 2019 – Oct 2021  ) 
WebSouls - Lahore, Punjab  
 
· Website development, SEO , and SMM client  handling.   
· Projects development management and client  meetings 
management.  
· Projects analysis and Proposals development.  
· Monthly weekly development team success reporting.  
· Collaborate with the development team and provide them with all 
the information for the project’s development . 
· Email Marketing . 
· Fiver, Upwork, and Freelancer ac counts and bids management.  
 
Email Support Executive - Systems Limited (Jan 2019 -March, 2019):   
· Handling chats and emails of international  clients.     
CONTACT  
Address : Lahore, PB 54000   
Phone : +92 (304) (1418484)  
Email : afnanfaiz273@gmail.com  
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in
/afnanfaiz/  
  
  
  
SKILLS  
● Microsoft Office.  
● Research Work.  
● Quick Learner.  
● Presentations  designing & 
development . 
● Business Development.  
● Building Customer Relations.  
● Client Engagement.  
● Analysis Reports.  
● Projects Management . 
● Proposal development.  
● Email Marketing.  
  · Assistance includes tracking clients’ orders from different courier 
portals and providing the right information and solutions to the 
clients as per the organization’s policies.  
 
Email Support Executive  - Mindbridge (May  2017 - Dec 2018):  
                 
· Handling emails of the international  clients of Uber.  
· Assistance includes tracking clients’  records and providing the right 
information and solutions to the clients as per the organization’s 
policies.  
 
 
  
  
  
EDUCATION  
(2020 -2022)              Masters in Business Administration  (MBA) from  
FAST -NUCES Lahore.          
(2015 -2019)              Bachelors in Business Administration  (BBA Hons) 
from NCBA&E . 
(2012 -2014)              Intermediate in Computer Sciences (ICS) from 
Punjab Group of Colleges . 
(2010 -2012)              Matriculation  
Govt. Pilot High Secondary Girls  School .
input.additional_info: At Acme Corp, we prioritize candidates from diverse educational backgrounds with proven experience in high-pressure sales environments. We welcome graduates from reputable institutions but hold no particular preference for any university. Relocation support is available on a case-by-case basis. Skills assessment will include a practical marketing project to gauge capability in real-world scenarios, complemented by personal interviews to evaluate cultural fit and growth potential.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
Demonstrated ability in team leadership and mentoring
5+ years of experience in sales and marketing roles
